Zentralmaschine

You have found the master site of Niels Hoffmann's online identity. I am a Berlin based Ruby on Rails and iOS developer for hire. You can find my CV in all its glory and completeness on linkedin. You can also find me on github, follow me on twitter or just contact me.

I build things on the internet and sometimes release them. I am the author of Blabber and Fandango.

When I am not hacking on a computer, I play electric and upright bass in a couple of bands, but that's a different story.
